name: Don't let him solo you
description:
Controls

Movement: ASDW
Ability 1 (Sword / Fireball): Left mouse button
Ability 2: (Dash / Laser): Shift key

The roles are reversed - YOU play the boss now

In this game you control the big boss, with huge HP reserves and the ability to one-shot the hero. However, after killing the hero, he will respawn. And with every respawn he will level up, gain stats and become better at dodging your attacks. But don't despair - when he finally manages to break you down, you will transform into your true form, a Dragon Lord!

How long can you survive until the hero inevitably manages to kill you?

Info

This game was made over a weekend for the Trijam 173. After failing the 3hrs time frame I decided to just polish the game for fun and ended up spending a total of ~18hrs on the game!

Game design, programming and art were done by me.
